item.title: Importance of Accounting
item.description: The importance of financial accounting practices is well known and majority of businesses have well established processes to record, summarize and analyze the historical and prospective information. Financial data is not only required to fulfill legal & tax reporting obligations but it also provides an overview of operational performance through management reporting, that helps to make informed business decisions.

item.title: About Us
item.description: ShriBooks is an online accounting system, providing a cost-effective way to manage accounting needs of growing businesses. Professionals and Small/Medium Businesses performing financial transactions need to maintain accounting data for statutory reporting and statistical analysis. ShriBooks aims to provide such features to easily record and analyze data in a collaborative way, so that customers can focus more on their core expertise to grow their business. We are based in Bengaluru, with a core team having experience of developing ERP application which is successfully implemented in many countries like Singapore, Malaysia, etc.
